title: What if Human Civilization Requires Religion (s)? Is there Religious Methadone?
description:
Bret Weinstein and Heather Heying have been working hard on their podcast. To my shock Heather read Rod Dreher's book Live Not By Lies. I may do a commentary video on their video but I wanted to do some talking first (of course). Why the commonalities we're running into? Is theology really running the show? 

Bret and Heather #50 https://youtu.be/zcB8Rnr7XBw
Live Not by Lies Rod Dreher https://amzn.to/2FP3Afr
Nassim Taleb on Theology https://medium.com/incerto/religion-violence-tolerance-progress-nothing-to-do-with-theology-a31f351c729e
Live Not by Lies Book Review https://conciliarpost.com/reviews/book-reviews/book-review-live-not-by-lies/
Rebel Wisdom Bret Weinstein Jamie Wheal Evolution and the Future https://youtu.be/KigJ5rn-4yE
Jordan Peterson Susan Blackmore Unbelievable Justin Brierley https://youtu.be/syP-OtdCIho
Commentary video https://youtu.be/M_cSNQ32c0w
Tom Holland Looking for Canterbury https://youtu.be/TJ3azTRrtvA
Bret Weinstein Alistar McGrath Unbelievable https://youtu.be/kRx2uNMJFnU
Tom Holland's Church https://www.churchofengland.org/more/media-centre/stories-and-features/tom-holland-preacher-who-brought-me-back-church
John Gray https://youtu.be/RddIXMZQi3o
Rousseau and Revolution Will Durant https://amzn.to/3dNK7Zd
Clay Routledge Supernatural https://amzn.to/3jhy7zZ
John Vervaeke Christopher Mastropietro Symptoms of the Meaning Crisis https://youtu.be/Sd549Qz957k
James Tour Rebecca McLaughlin: Confronting Christianity https://youtu.be/Vm5W_5gnT-Q
